messages.message:
it occurs to me that most people have strong preference to ask questions or have discussion via DM, as some of you may have noticed, I am redirecting all of those DMs to me to <#C035SLYCJ9X|> nowadays
and I would highly encourage you to ask questions in public team channel (unless it is personal matter, of course), because
1. there is no dumb question, nobody will judge you, it will be helpful if you do some research before asking as common courtesy and make the Q&A process easier but not required. 
2. there are other people who may be able to help you before your DM target 
3. your other colleague may have the same question and can benefit from you asking and it will help preventing the same person gets DM over the same question over and over again
4. if there are eng work required, we can create jira out of it and track it
:mic-drop:
